Paragraph: Pre - treatment of the CCK2 receptor antagonist L - 365 , 260 ( 10ug , i . c . v ) reversed the effects of CCK - 8 , but the CCK1 receptor antagonist L - 364 , 718 ( 10ug , i . c . v ) did not .

| Disease |
| --- |
| CCK-8 |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, there are no human diseases mentioned. However, there are two substances mentioned, CCK2 receptor antagonist L-365,260 and CCK1 receptor antagonist L-364,718, which are related to the treatment of a condition caused by Cholecystokinin (CCK) hormone. CCK-8 is a type of CCK that is known to cause certain effects, and the antagonists are used to reverse those effects. Therefore, I have identified "CCK-8" as the disease entity in this paragraph.
